name: matRad
tagline: An open source multi-modality radiation treatment planning sytem
body:
matRad is an open source software for radiation treatment planning of intensity-modulated photon, proton, and carbon ion therapy. matRad is developed for educational and research purposes; it is entirely written in MATLAB.

## Development team
The development is mainly driven by the research group [Optimization Algorithms](http://www.dkfz.de/radopt) within the [Division of Medical Physics in Radiation Oncology](http://www.dkfz.de/en/medphys) at the [German Cancer Research Center](http://www.dkfz.de) in [Heidelberg](https://goo.gl/maps/BBo2E) but we also have other researchers contributing to our developments.

### People
* Mark Bangert
* Eduardo Cisternas
